Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and interactions of cationic peptides derived from Galleria mellonella cecropin D-like peptide with model membranes.
Literature.Author: Onate-Garzón J, Manrique-Moreno M, Trier S, Leidy C, Torres R, Patino E

Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity of a Cationic Antimicrobial Peptide against Multidrug-Resistant Gram-Negative Clinical Isolates and Their Potential Molecular Targets.
Literature.Author: Rivera-Sánchez SP, Agudelo-Góngora HA, Onate-Garzón J, Flórez-Elvira LJ, Correa A, Londoño PA, Londoño-Mosquera JD, Aragón-Muriel A, Polo-Cerón D, Ocampo-Ibáñez ID

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6.88% Hemolysis=115 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=735.4 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=4-8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MBC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=8-16µg/ml)
